dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: The UCF-101 action recognition dataset contains 13,320 videos, each showing a single human action. The average length of the videos is 180 frames, and there are 101 categories, which implies a small number of videos per class, slightly more than 100 on average.
dcterms:title: UCF-101

dcterms:creator: A. Karpathy
G. Toderici
S. Shetty
T. Leung
R. Sukthankar
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: The Sports-1M dataset is a collection of over one million videos on YouTube in 487 classes, all related to sports. The videos have unconstrained lengths, ranging from a few seconds to hours.
dcterms:title: Sports-1M
